# bal-tooltip

## Example

```html
<bal-tooltip header="123" text="Tooltip Text"></bal-tooltip>
<bal-tooltip header="123" text="This is a very long tooltip text. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet."></bal-tooltip>
```

| -------- | --------- | ------------ | -------- | ----------- |
| `text`   | `text`    | Tooltip text | `string` | `undefined` |
